channel.title: Almost like a pk reward but

item.title: Almost like a pk reward but
item.dc:creator: @spon80 spon80
item.description:
@spon80 wrote:

Double edit: instead of it dropping the player that die’s items it would delete them from his inventory ect. but it would instead add items from a list say in item2. is this possible?

ItemHandler.addItem(playerItems[weapon]-1, absX, absY, playerItemsN[weapon], playerId, false)

can only get it to drop players items… =@

any way to modify the code to get it to drop random items?

heres my code im using, declared basically everything.

[code]public void cwdie()
{
if(cwdie2()) {

    teleportToX = 2806;
    teleportToY = 2785;
    heightLevel = 0;
    EntangleDelay = 0;
            teleblock = false;
            //pEmote = 10;
    updateRequired = true;

appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
removeAllItems();
for(int r=0; r<playerEquipment.length; r++) {
try {
int item = playerEquipment[r];
if((item > 0) && (item < 20000)) {
remove(item, r);
}
} catch(Exception e) { sendMessage(“ERROR: Removing Equipment”); }
}
removeAllItems();
teleportToX = 2806;
teleportToY = 2785;
EntangleDelay = 0;
teleblock = false;
//pEmote = 15;
//pWalk = 13;
sendMessage(“Oh dear! You Have Gotten Pwned!!! OH NOES!”);
hitDiff = 0;
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
}[/code]

what and where would i add additem randompk reward thing and what kind of java would i use like a killerid or what i cant figure it out, please help me

Edit: the reward would go to the player that killed the person that died

Read full topic
